example.eg: Tony drew a square on the paper.
example.egtrans: 托尼在纸上画了个正方形。

example.eg: The square was popular with the tourists because of its cafes and surrounding buildings.
example.egtrans: 这个广场因为咖啡馆和周围建筑而深受游客欢迎。

example.eg: My wife prefers square tables, while I prefer them to be longer.
example.egtrans: 我妻子喜欢正方形的桌子，而我则喜欢长一点的。

example.eg: Because the building was triangular, none of the corners was square.
example.egtrans: 因为那栋建筑是三角形的，所以没有一个直角。

example.eg: Is this picture square with the other one?
example.egtrans: 这幅画跟另一幅平齐吗？

example.eg: The apartment was 100 square meters in size.
example.egtrans: 这间公寓的面积是100平方米。

example.eg: Are you being square with me?  I certainly hope so.
example.egtrans: 你没跟我撒谎吧？我希望你没有。

example.eg: He is so square that he wouldn't even enjoy this music.
example.egtrans: 他太过古板守旧，甚至没有办法欣赏这首乐曲。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 古板守旧的，思想保守传统的

example.eg: I hit you once, then you hit me back; I guess we're square now.
example.egtrans: 我打过你，之后你也打回来了，我们现在算是不互相欠。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 扯平的, 互不相欠的

example.eg: Here's your money.  Are we square now?

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不再欠账的, 互不欠债的

example.eg: Aaron punched Jimmy square on the jaw.
example.egtrans: 亚伦出拳精准，一拳就打在了吉米的下巴上。

example.eg: Tom always acts square in business deals, never cheating his clients.
example.egtrans: 汤姆做生意总是公平公正，从不欺瞒客户。

example.eg: The architect used a plastic square to draw the 90-degree angle.
example.egtrans: 建筑师用一把直角尺来画90度角。

example.eg: In chess, a pawn can advance two squares on its first move.
example.egtrans: 国际象棋中，小兵可以在第一次移动中前进两个方格。

example.eg: The square of 3 is 9.
I squared off the planks to make them even.

dsense.name: square [sth]
dsense.guideword: (math: multiply a number by itself) (数学)

example.eg: Three squared is nine.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 使...成平方, 求...二次幂

example.eg: The army recruit squared his shoulders when the sergeant entered the room.
He squared his actions with his beliefs.
I won't feel better until I've squared things with my brother.
The boxers squared off before the referee blew the whistle.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 摆好架势准备打斗, 把…划分成方格, 使成四方形

dsense.name: square [sth] up, square up [sth]
dsense.guideword: figurative, informal (settle a bill) (非正式用语)

example.eg: Can you pay the bill? I'll square it up with you later.
The boxers squared up and the opening bell sounded.
The wrestler squared up to his opponent.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 对...摆好架势，对...摩拳擦掌

dsense.name: square up to [sb/sth]
dsense.guideword: (prepare to solve a problem) (指解决问题)

example.eg: The evidence doesn't square with the defendant's story.
In academic essays, in-text citations are often in brackets.
example.egtrans: 在学术论文中，文内引用通常放在方括号内。

example.eg: We will use a chi-square test to see if the actual statistical distribution fits the theoretical distribution.

dsense.name: fair and square, fairly and squarely

example.eg: My nine-year-old daughter played a great game of chess; she beat me fair and square.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 公平地，公正地，光明正大地
坚决的，坚定的，坚定不移的
方正牢固地, 方方正正地，方正地
坚决地，坚定地，坚定不移地
厘清头绪, 理顺头绪

example.eg: Your tale does not square with the facts as we know them.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 与…不一致, 和…不相符

example.eg: There is a public square in the middle of the town.
The students learnt how to calculate the root mean square of a set of numbers.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 公平交易, 诚信买卖

dsense.name: square foot, plural: square feet
dsense.guideword: often pl (imperial measure: one foot squared)

example.eg: The room is only twenty-two square feet; that's not a lot of room for furniture!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 平方公里, 平方千米

example.eg: I eat three square meals a day, plus several snacks.

dsense.name: square meter (US), square metre (UK)
dsense.guideword: usually plural (area of 1m x 1m) (美式拼法)

example.eg: My garden measures about 30 square meters.
The surgeon removed eight square millimetres of tissue from the affected area.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 回到起点, 回到原地
异类，格格不入的人，不合群之人

example.eg: The square root of 64 is 8.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 准备好, 做好...的准备

example.eg: Variance is a tool that can be used to analyze data statistically.
